trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_SEQ_00<tab>Your work is far from finished, as Conrad knows.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_TODO_00<tab>Search the Fringes for remnants of the imperial army.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raubahn.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Conrad.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ARENVALD_000_001<tab>Did you see that, A'aba, Aulie? We did it!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_MNAAGO_000_005<tab><pant> <pant> For a moment there, I didn't think I could do it...but then I did!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_LYSE_000_010<tab>One step at a time, one step at a time. Until we're on Zenos's doorstep!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ANANTASOLDIER_000_015<tab>Ssso, you are indeed everything they sssay. The ssstuff of legends...
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_020<tab>There's still a chance that some imperials are holed up inside the castellum. We'll need to search it top to bottom to be sure it's safe.

TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_021<tab>In the meantime, I want you to rendezvous with the main host. Keep your weapons at the ready─there's a chance you might come face<var 1F /var>to<var 1F /var>face with soldiers on the run en route.

TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_022<tab>On second thought, it might be prudent for you to do a preemptive sweep of the region for soldiers that have gone to ground. We shouldn't afford them any time to regroup and launch a counterattack.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_023<tab>When you've judged your work to be done, report to General Aldynn in Bittermill.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_025<tab>Just because we've won doesn't mean it's over yet. There're still enemies about, and a panicked soldier can kill you just as quick as a cool-headed one.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You sense a desperate presence!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_BALLOON_000_030<tab>Don't come any closer!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_BALLOON_000_035<tab>Sod this! I'm not dying today!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>The Bull of Ala Mhigo has done it again. His assessment of Fordola's response was without error.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>It's a good thing M'naago got the flag flying when she did. Any longer and those imperials might have had us at their mercy...

TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RAUBAHN_000_050<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((Well met)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((Well met)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. All's well at the bridge?
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RAUBAHN_000_051<tab>Good, good. The fighting has died down here too, as you can see.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RAUBAHN_000_052<tab>Pipin left but a moment ago with a contingent of troops to occupy Velodyna. If and when the imperials return, they'll find us dug in behind their own walls.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>I could not have hoped for a better outcome, General. Splendidly done.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RAUBAHN_000_054<tab>Let's not get ahead of ourselves. It'll take more than one castellum to turn the tide.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RAUBAHN_000_055<tab>My men and I will deal with the remaining enemy forces. Scions, I bid you return to Commander Kemp and his men.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>Delight not overmuch in victory─not when there are battles left to fight...
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>Our work here is finished. Our Resistance allies are waiting.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>From a stone bridge to a massive fortress... Garlean engineering never ceases to impress.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Now that we have taken control of Velodyna, there's nothing stopping us from marching east towards the Peaks.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_LYSE_000_070<tab>If you're looking for Arenvald, I think he's with Pipin, searching the castellum for any remaining soldiers.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_RESISTANCEGATEGUARD_000_075<tab>Velodyna belongs to the Alliance and the Resistance now. You may be assured that the imperials will never hold it again!
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_080<tab>Back so soon? I suppose the General and his men had matters well in hand.
TEXT_STMBDA603_02529_CONRAD_000_081<tab>The vice marshal and his men showed up not long after you left. If the gods are good, there'll be no one left to fight...
